name: Ball Shoot Island
description:
Play the brand new exciting bubble shooting puzzle game and enjoy an amazing.

Features:
- To Kill the Boring Time!
- The levels will get harder gradually and you’ll never get bored.
- Beautiful graphics and cool animations.
- Four different dramatic Boosters that help you win the game. The Boosters are all easy to master!
- Smooth and perfect operation of the game! Fluent shooting experience!
- Free download and free level updates!
